comments.comments_text: Problems for Eusebio Di Francesco as Javier Pastore is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Lorenzo Pellegrini (AS Roma) replaces him.

comments.comments_text: Goal! It's a catastrophic error from the opponent which has gifted a chance to Lorenzo Pellegrini (AS Roma), who rolls the ball into the back of the net from close range. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) was quite harsh and Gianluca Rocchi didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: GOAL! A terrible mistake leads to a goal. The defender ends up losing possession, allowing Ciro Immobile (Lazio) to pick up the ball before slotting it into the back of the net to make it 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Tempers flare after Milan Badelj (Lazio) commits a foul. He receives a yellow card for his bad challenge and surely must be relieved at not receiving a red card. AS Roma are awarded a free kick from a dangerous position.

comments.comments_text: Aleksandar Kolarov (AS Roma) struck with a perfectly taken free kick from the edge of the box. He curled the ball straight inside the right post. There are not enough superlatives that can be used to describe that goal.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Lorenzo Pellegrini sends a cross in from the set piece and Federico Fazio (AS Roma) leaps high to connect with it on the edge of the 6-yard box. His close-range header goes inside the left post and the score changes to 3:1.

comments.comments_text: Sergej Milinkovic-Savic (Lazio) sends the ball into the box from the side of the pitch, but his cross is blocked. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Lazio will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
